dmca.title: [EV1-C1290932Q] DMCA Notification ISP thenewconnection.com/Thales
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, October 10, 2006 2:54 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1290932Q] DMCA Notification ISP thenewconnection.com/Thales Subject: [EV1-C1290932Q] DMCA Notification ISP thenewconnection.com/Thales ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA Notification ISP thenewconnection.com/Thales Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 10 2006 06:32 am X-MailFrom: bdavis@netenforcers.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Oct 10 07:30:03 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 10 Oct 2006 07:29:46 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 10 Oct 2006 07:29:47 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GXGjy-0006Aj-O8; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 07:29:46 -0500 Received: from [69.25.50.217] (helo=ms17.mse9.exchange.ms) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from bdavis@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GXGju-000Bky-Os; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 07:29:42 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6EC67.C2531076"; type="multipart/alternative" Subject: DMCA Notification ISP thenewconnection.com/Thales Date: Tue, 10 Oct 2006 08:29:40 -0400 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: DMCA Notification ISP thenewconnection.com/Thales Thread-Index: AcbsZ8GWbMe90A+MT2qXXVi0KvJUYg== From: "Barbara Davis" To: , , Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 69.25.50.217 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of netenforcers.com) client-ip=69.25.50.217; envelope-from=bdavis@netenforcers.com; helo=ms17.mse9.exchange.ms; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Oct 2006 12:29:47.0056 (UTC) FILETIME=[C5C6BB00:01C6EC67] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) 10/11/2006 7155 5474 4100 4340 7621 VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED Designated Agent ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. George Poletes 1333 Stemmons Parkway Suite 110 Dallas TX 75207 Re: Unauthorized Use of Intellectual Property Dear Designated Agent: This office is authorized to act on behalf of Magellan Navigation, Inc. in this matter. This letter is to provide you notice pursuant to 17 U.S.C. § 512 (c) (3) (A) of unauthorized use of copyrighted material of Thales Navigation, Inc. ("Magellan") (such copyrighted material is referred to as "Magellan Works") by your client, TheNewConnection, at the URL www.thenewconnection.com. Magellan has a good faith belief that use of the Infringing Material by your client is not authorized by Magellan, its agents, or the law. The information contained in this letter is accurate, and under the penalty of perjury, Net Enforcers is authorized to act on behalf of Magellan. The specific works, graphics or other material Magellan believes to be infringed or to be the subject of infringing activity (the "Infringing Material") are copyrighted images from Magellan's website. Specific violations of copyrighted images by thenewconnection.com are listed below this paragraph. http://www.thenewconnection.com/vi-17815________Magellan-Explorist-300-.html http://www.thenewconnection.com/vi-17816________Magellan-eXplorist-500-.html http://www.thenewconnection.com/vi-17817________Magellan-eXplorist-600-.html Therefore, pursuant to the requirements of 17 U.S.C. § 512(c) (1) (C), Magellan hereby demands that you remove or disable access to the Infringing Material in an expeditious manner. If you have questions, please contact Net Enforcers Compliance Management Department via facsimile to 352-505-0040, or via email to Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com. All communication must be in writing. Net Enforcers is authorized to handle and resolve this matter with you and has already been involved with this case. Calls directly to Magellan will not be accepted. If Infringer does not respond to this demand as requested by 5:00 p.m. on 10/20/2006, we will assume that this demand has been rejected and we will proceed accordingly. Sincerely, VCLM law Lance C. Venable Attorney at Law LCV/roc Barbara Davis LMS Manager Net Enforcers Inc. BDavis@netenforcers.com compliance.management@netenforcers.com The Online Enforcement Specialists...... Statement of Confidentiality The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are intended solely for the addressee. The information may also be legally privileged. This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended recipient. If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you. MIME element (text/html)

 

10/11/2006

7155 5474 4100 4340 7621

 

VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 Stemmons Parkway Suite 110
